name: Viridis I Rug Set
description:
Viridis I. Furniture and Decor Collection

Color Doctrina. Act I.

The Color Doctrina collection is an exploration of color theory and its relationships with architecture. Color has the power to alter one's perception of space and time. This unification can begin to enhance the human experience shifting the user from one dimension to another dimension.

Rewards:
+ HardGoods Playable NFTs
+ First Pass to Hardwrld (Hard Metaverse)
+ Access to Whitelist, Commissions, Merchandise, More

For more info regarding Color Doctrina. Act I please follow @HardArchitects for more information.
